name: Monster Grabber
description:
Monster Grabber is a Global Game Jam 2022 game based on the theme "duality." We ended up winning 3rd place at our location! It being a game jam game means it's quite short and buggy, so keep that in mind. There is both keyboard and controller support. The game was only tested with an XBox controller, but theoretically most standard controllers should work.

The idea:

Monsters are both enemies AND weapons.

Controls:

  • WASD / Left Stick to move
  • Enter / X Button to attack or use a monster
  • ' / A Button to grab a monster
  • Escape / Start to pause

Notes:

  • Progress by going to the right into the cave.
  • Monsters can only be grabbed while flashing.
  • Monsters have a limited number of uses and will disappear when they're used up.
  • The game will reload upon dying.
